Speaking of patched version, it seems like i failed because of my faked memory stick. Today i decrypted EBOOT and it was enough for game to work on my 5.50 GEN-D3. Please, someone test it on your consoles and report back. If this method works, i'll post a patched version for guys with older firmwares. Peace.

P.S.: I was really bothered by the standard "Shooter type" controls, especially after playing japanese version. Switched to "Action type 2" for the sake of own sanity :)
I was also bummed about the "shooter" type controls and switched to type 2. Feels much better :D

I've been through the first and second chapters with no issues in game and saving.

Got it working on 5.50 Prometheus 4 after patching the game using ISO Tools  1.970. To people who can't make this game work on their PSP's: if you're on either CFW 5.00 M33, 5.03 GEN or 5.50 GEN, patch your firmware with Prometheus 4 addon for either 5.00 M33, 5.03 GEN, or 5.50 GEN, depending on what firmware your PSP has. 

Thanks for the upload NitrogenUA. ^________^

@hotshotvegetarian

Patch your firmware with Prometheus 4 addon for 5.00 M33. If Prometheus 4 can't make the game work, use ISO Tools to decrypt and patch the ISO. The game should work afterwards.
